Went for lunch and then back the next day for brunch.  Food both times was great!  We had the burger a(perfectly cooked medium), Philly dip and for brunch we tried the breakfast tacos and the Fat Elvis French toast. Everything was delicious. Notably, sweet potato fries were the best I've had. Really enjoyed the breakfast tacos. These people know how to treat potatoes. The flavors were right on. We also had the Concord cider and a couple of the beers. Really good! Tried the Mimosa and bloody Mary. Would've liked the Mimosa grapefruit to be made with fresh squeezed.  Follow me on Instagram withlovefrommiche for more on Michigan eats and brews.
Our new favorite brewery!! So many fantastic beers. The food was the best we’ve had at any brewery in town. The staff is outstanding too!!

name: AnQi Sushi Express
address: 111 E Allegan St #1801, Lansing, MI 48933, USA
reviews: Food came in prepackaged boxes, which was fine. The store seemed more like a hole in the wall type, which was fine. Sushi selection was limited but taste was good & the price was affordable which was fine. However, the noodles were bad enough that I doubt I'd consider coming back here, I've had instant noodles that were more delicious than the ones I had here.

This place was absolutely wonderful. It was only my 2nd experience with sushi and the staff was patient and eager to answer my questions as to what was what. Very friendly. The flavors were great. I also tried the mango bubble Milkshake. It was very sweet, and not really what I expected, but still happy to have experienced it. I will definitely return to this place next time I am in Lansing!
Great for quick lunch sushi. They have a stamp card loyalty program.

Friendly staff. Very good dumplings, fresh made ready to grab sushi, some interesting creations as well. But those noodles....oh those noodles. So good! Today I had Inferno noodles after waking up with a slight hangover, scared the evil right out 😁 Thank you!
Lovely establishment, simple yet effective menu. Daily specials and affordable prices. Portion sizes are large and the people are very kind.

name: Korea House Restaurant
address: 978 Trowbridge Rd, East Lansing, MI 48823, USA
reviews: This was the best Korean food I have found in East Lansing. It was visually appealing, had beautiful aromatics, and tasted amazing. If I could give it more than 5 stars I would! That plus an extremely nice wait staff made for an experience I can’t wait to have again.
Delicious authentic Korean cuisine as always! Worth the 2 hour drive everytime! Nice atmosphere.  Clean.  Warm and personable staff.... legit best place in Michigan for Korean cravings.

I love the menus. My friends and i decided to make this place as our post-exam celebration kind of self reward. Their small portion is big enough for 2-3 people! Need to come with very empty stomach!!

They might have grumpy old ladies as the waitresses, but who cares. I just want their foods.
It was ok, underwhelming. Seemed busy though. Some of the food was good like the dumplings. Main course was so so.

Out of all the Korean restaurants I've been to in East Lansing and Grand Rapids, this one is the most consistent in quality throughout the years. The taste is always authentic and the restaurant is also very clean. The waitresses are very friendly and give decent recommendations but my favorite part about the place is the diversity of the menu.

name: Falsetta's Casa Nova
address: 138 S Waverly Rd, Lansing, MI 48917, USA
reviews: My wife and I recently tried this place for the first time during a fun date night. We loved this place. The food was delicious! But even more importantly, the service was outstanding! We had a new employee training during our visit, but if her trainer hadnt mentioned that she was new, you never would have known. All around one of the best dining experiences in Lansing!
Great service huge portions of good food. What's not to like?

It has been around a while, and could use some updates. BUT, me and a whole prior generation of my family have been coming here for quite some, and the best thing I think I can say to recommend eating here is, I've never had a bad meal here. It is, at worst, a somewhat boring venue with reliable food and staff. Onion rings and the pizza (get that special!) are some of the best in the area.
Delicious pizza and breadsticks with mozzarella cheese n meatsauce dipping.

I have been going to this restaurant for years, it is a staple establishment of Lansing Mi and everyone should go there at least once. I love the spinach manicotti, buffalo chicken tenders and the loaded potato soup. They are not afraid to try new things and have had different deals and items on their menu over the years.

name: Claddagh Irish Pub
address: 2900 Centre Blvd, Lansing, MI 48912, USA
reviews: I was looking so forward to some of our friends for an Irish dinner.  We arrived at 4:30 my husband and I had a drink while waiting for our friends to arrive they got there about 10 minutes later.  They order drinks and we ordered appetizers for the table.  We waited for several minutes for our food to arrive.  We the. Placed our dinner orders which also took several minutes.  By then, we ordered another round of drinks.  The food was delicious, but as we were finishing up, our waitress came to tell us in the next 20 minutes a table of 6 was going to need our table.  We weren’t even done with our drinks yet.  About 10 minutes later she told us not to worry they found another table.  About 10 minutes later the manager arrives at our table and asked us how the food was, we said it was great.  Then he folded his hands and my husband asked him: You want us to leave?  He said yes not to be mean but yes we need the table.  Seriously?  We just spent a lot of money on drinks, appetizers, and dinners for 4 and we were never asked if we wanted dessert, coffee or more drinks.  Just we need the table.  I’m insulted, as were our friends.  We eat out a lot and I’ve never been asked to leave a restaurant.  We recently returned from a trip to Ireland where some of the friendliest people I’ve ever met welcomed us as strangers to their country.  They never asked us to leave and instead encouraged us to stay longer.  Very disappointed with your hospitality!   Our total time there was 1.5 hours.  Not excessive by any means.
Fantastic food at a great price. Had the fish and chips and a Guinness for dinner. Excellent meal in a cool Irish pub environment.

Fast and friendly staff. I tried the Ginger Bush cocktail, if you like whiskey and Moscow mules then this is a fun twist on that. Super refreshing. I also had the pan seared trout, very good! Would definitely have it again 👍

Claddagh has a great combination of Irish fare and typical pub food. Their staff are always friendly and the food is always good. You'll see a great mix between young and old there on any given night, so it's a great place for everyone.

We just got done eating here for the first time and it was for our 2 year anniversary. We wanted to try some place we both haven’t been. We were both disappointed and won’t be coming back. 
The bartender was our waitress and didn’t write down our build your own burger order. Both of our burgers came to us wrong. My boyfriend was ok with his but he sent my burger back for me since it was missing the fried egg and onion straws. When my new burger was delivered, it had the correct toppings however it was under cooked. I always order my burgers well done. Obviously the bartender needs to write down orders so she can put them in to the computer correctly. What a waste of money...

name: Fazoli's
address: 5705 S Cedar St, Lansing, MI 48911, USA
reviews: It's the McDonald's of Italian food. I tried the ultimate sampler. Nothing was bad, but nothing was great. The price however was really good. I'd probably go back there for lunch, and maybe occasionally dinner if I just want something quick and cheap. It's a really good value for the price, but if you want really good Italian food, I'd look elsewhere.

I gave them only 3 stars because I was not greeted, even though there were 3 workers in my vicinity. The food was delicious. I had a very customized order and the got it right! Kudos to them for that. When it was time to take care of my dishes, the waste hole was blocked by cleaning buckets and supplies, so I had to just leave them above the dish bin (which was full). 
The restaurant was clean and my dinner was delicious!!

Fazoli's is one of my favorite fast food restaurants.  It is great to get a delicious Italian meal so quickly.  The first Fazoli's that  I went to was in Appleton, WI many years ago.  Then after that I was mainly going to the one in Lansing,  MI as we don't have one near where I live.  Now, as I travel I have been seeking them out.  The spaghetti and sauce are my favorite, and the bread sticks are unlimited and they are also delicious.  I recently tried the pizza and that was very good also.

Eating allergy free and VEGAN at this Fazolis was made simple and easy! Thank you for being so accommodating! We ordered this spicy penne pasta dish adjusted to meet our dietary requirements.
"Staff were very helpful and focused on getting it right the first time.👍"

If you're looking for a cheap, quick option for a great pasta night, Fazoli's is the place. They have spaghetti to bacon Mac and cheese. Don't forget the breadsticks, those are to die for. Most items on the menu, are unlimited. 10/10!

name: El Azteco
address: 1016 W Saginaw St, Lansing, MI 48915, USA
reviews: Anyone that has ever come here knows that their menu is awesome with lots of choices but their tortilla chips, salsa and cheese dip is incredible and a must have!  A great place to enjoy with family and friends!!

Delicious traditional Mexican food at great prices with friendly service. Chips and salsa are both homemade and excellent. I’ve been visiting El Az since the late 1980s and choose this location over the EL location any day. Awesome new patio addition!
Amazing food . Generous portions . Great service. Salsa was the bomb. El Porto in owosso ahould take cooking leason from them. Real mexican food

It was crazy busy when we went due to Christmas rush and being down a server. Even so, our food came quickly after being ordered.  It was hot and delicious as always.   I was pleasantly surprised to find that on Monday kids 12 and under eat free.  We had to ask for chips to go with our cheese dip and hunt down someone to get our check but everyone was helpful and very apologetic.  They work very well as a team and made a genuine effort to make it work.

I have been going there since I can remember as a kid. LOVE their burrito plates, my favorite platter! The spicy burrito needs to be spicier though. Went there right after I graduated from Michigan State and it was awesome!

name: AI Fusion Sushi & Grill
address: 2827 E Grand River Ave, East Lansing, MI 48823, USA
reviews: Enjoyed the Shrimp Tempura Appetizer was Amazing & such a Beautiful Presentation as well! We enjoyed our Uni Soups - Shrimp Tempura & the Chicken one & the were {{{Scrumptious}}}

The location is a bit hidden, you’ll have to drive into the back of the parking lot to get to it. The service was good, he waiters are nice. My only complaint is the quality of the sashimi. It’s not the best, I believe it is frozen which is fine but the price doesn’t reflect that. The soft shell crab was very good though. I would order that again.

What a great experience. We felt the staff really took care in how to ensure the safety of staff and customers during this time. We have always enjoyed Ai’s sushi, but their commitment to sanitization and cleanliness was truly impressive and the sushi was delicious. I would definitely recommend ordering from Ai Fusion any time, but especially if you are looking for a place to support during these hard times.

This place is a little hidden to get to. Amazing service and ambience. Their sushi is really good and I'd come back again for their sushi. I had their fusion roll and the AI roll and both of them were really good. For the appetizer i tried their gyoza which was okay. It didn't really taste like a gyoza.
Excellent sushi, really good service! All around great place to dine at a really good price. You'll never go away hungry & usually have take home. A must try

name: La Cocina Cubana LLC
address: 123 S Washington Square, Lansing, MI 48933, USA
reviews: Nice little cozy eating spot in downtown Lansing. The food is flavorful and delicious. Portions are nice size. Fast friendly service. Busy during our lunch visit but everything was handled well. We will come back again.

We were very pleased with our meal + are eager to try more dishes.

Traditional Cuban Sandwich was very good, especially paired with a side of Fried Yuca + garlicky Ketchup Mayo dipping sauce, which were my favorites! 

Churrasco de Pollo, Rice + Beans + Maduros (instead of Tostones that come with the platter). The chicken was tender + flavorful! The maduros were riper + softer than I prefer, but I do love the pairing of sweet plantanos with savory chicken, rice + beans. 

(FYI: As a foodie of Caribbean descent, I cheered when I plucked a piece of bay leaf from my rice — it's like finding a prize in a cereal box + further proof that this is made-from-scratch the way I cook mine at home!)

The fresh Pineapple Juice was delicious + not too sweet. 

Cafe Con Leche was tasty, but I do like my espresso to be a bit stronger.

Muy rico! My mother-in-law is Cuban and La Cocina Cubana is the closest thing I can get to her authentic Cuban cooking. The dishes here are truly Cuban and food is extremely delicious. Try the ropa vieja or the vaca frita, two is my favorite Cuban dishes and La Cocina Cubana makes them perfectly!
Server was very nice,  friendly and food was delicious.

Delicious coffee! My boyfriend and I stopped in here after a tour of the Capitol because all the Biggbys and other coffee places around were closed. It was so good! Went down extremely smoothly with a nice crema and it was very strong, just the way I like it. A perfect pick-me-up! Definitely will be back next time we're in Lansing.

name: Cask & Company Kitchen & Bar
address: 3415 E Saginaw St, Lansing, MI 48912, USA
reviews: I have been all over the country for more years than I will express now. However... I will say I have been to over 10,000 restaurants. Some were great, some not so much. But. This resurrection of an amazing experience at a restaurant deserves nothing short of 5 stars. Wait staff was incredible. The ingredients of the food.... Out of this world. It was a family friendly environment. I am so happy to say that me and my family will always return. Thank You! Great Work!

Overall great experience. Interesting menu but they make it work to be honest. Want pho they have it, want sushi they have it, want mac and cheese they have it, want burger or wings they have it. The crab rangoon was good - light and fluffy. My wife had their classic burger and it was on point. I had the high end mac and cheese and it was good but I think for $17 it wasn't great. It would be nice to have a $12-13 option without the brisket (but the brisket was good). The chocolate cake was a little underwhelming, which was surprising because they mentioned they get it from Cheesecake Factory. Great beer and wine selection well done. The atmosphere was good, but it felt awkward to have so many TVs on the walls, it's upscale dinning with buffalo wild wings TVs on the walls? It's even more perplexing because there is a bar right next door which I believe are owned by the same people. But that's a nitpick I suppose. I would recommend and will definitely be back.

Lunch buffet is great. The place is clean and stylish. Wait staff is friendly and prompt. I went here once and loved it so much that I went back 2 more times. The sriracha chicken is to die for. The selection is smaller than other buffets, but the quality is pretty high. There are 6-7 dishes plus various sushi rolls and things. Will be a regular, and I don't even like to eat lunch!

Went for Valentine's day and was pleasantly  surprised. The food was great.We ordered the special Bree cheese appetizer which was amazing. We also ordered the maukau sushi roll which had a bit of spicy to it but lots of good flavors. The prices where a bit high but not outrageous. They had a large selection of drinks to choose from. The service was great. I definitely will go back to  try out more of the menu.
We went for Valentine's dinner and I am very happy with the experience.  The food was 10/10. It has a great ambiance, the server was very pleasant.  I would be excited to go again
